question: Bengali poet Joy Goswami was honoured with this award.
explanation: Bengali poet Joy Goswami will be honoured with the Moortidevi Award for the year 2017. The Moortidevi annual award is given for an expressive and perceptive work which highlights human values written in any Indian languages or English. The Moortidevi Award consists of a Saraswati Statue, a Citation Plaque and cash award of Rs 4 lakh. It is the first time the Moortidevi Award is given to a Bengali poet.
